tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Highly recommended!!! Our journey with mam started from pregnancy check ups..she asked only for important blood tests *** ****** ******* *** *********** *********** ** ***** *** She is approachable and quickly responds in case of important queries. At 9th month of scan I come to know that cord around baby but she approached with positive hope and timely decision.

Dear Florence Mam,
You just glow with your presence for us and I'm sure your nature in taking care of us might have not let you know the kind of impact you made on us with this journey to make it more smooth and memorable. We're overflowing with gratitude as we reflect on the incredible journey of bringing my daughter into the world, and it's impossible to express just how thankful I am for your exceptional care.

Your expertise transformed what could have been a daunting experience into a beautiful and natural miracle. Your unwavering support was our anchor, and your calm demeanor provided a sense of reassurance that made all the difference.

We used to talk about you in most of our conversations during our pregnancy as that's the kind of conversation and connect we have had with you.

Thank you, from the depths of my heart, for playing such a vital role in the arrival of our daughter.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I recomend cherub hospital for pregnancy care ,good hospital near my locality and friendly sisters who support us

This was my first visit, I left the clinic with much more positivity.
Staffs are efficient and caring to all patients.
Doctor is extremely calm and evaluated my medical histories from the beginning with all sincerity. 
Clinic provides Dietary help and having facilities like Lab ( they provide home collection too) and pharmacy so that one doesn't have to worry about tests and medicines.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Irregular Periods,Pregnancy Check Up,Infertility Evaluation / Treatment,
review: Visited cherub clinic for infertility teatment. Flowrance mam is very friendly and lovable. doctor listened to our problem patiently and give treatment accordingly..  her possitive words is very much encouraging..Her commitment towards patient is highly appreciated (Doctor answer to our doubt through whatsapp anytime).. We blessed with Baby Boy by normal delivery this June Month.. Thank you so much for the doctor for making my pregnancy much happy, safe and easier even during this pandamic covid-19 situation.. Doctor is highly recommended..

** *** **** ** **** **** ******* ******* ** ***** the doctor said she could not identify pregnancy evidence... Taken urine test for which they charged another 1700... The result was positive and still the doctor said she needs to take scan on another day for proceeding further...*** **** **** **** *** *** ** ***** **** ** **** ******* ******** ******* *** **** **** **** **** *** ***** ****************** ** ****** ******** *** **** *** ******* ********* ** **** ***** ** *** **** ** ******** ***** *** ****** ********

review: I visited the doctor for second pregnancy after two miscarriages.Florence Mam treated very well with all supportive medicines and positive words.She is always reachable on watsapp or calls to clear our doubts any time. Finally we are blessed with baby boy this month.she took care from day 1 of pregnancy to the date of discharge from hospital. highly recommended for all.

review:
Dr florence has vast experience in the field of gynaecology. She examines the patients thoroughly, listens to their symptoms and gives a wholesome treatment with proper diagnosis, suitable medicines and suggests lifestyle changes. Excellent Doctor in our area.
Dhivya Ramesh.
